cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format 'invalid.ip' will cause network connection failures and prevent communication with the AMF.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink frequency band to an invalid value of 1000 will exceed supported frequency bands and cause configuration validation errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行頻率頻帶設定為無效的值 1000，將超過支援的頻率頻帶，並導致配置驗證錯誤。
